everyone on the porch agreed they liked lemonade .

the music was nice and some of the guests danced .
output.sentences: On the table, there was a tall pitcher of lemonade.
She things that it's very delicious.
Everyone on the porch agreed that the lemonade was good.
In addition to lemonade, mixed drinks were also served.
It was nice to see the guests dancing to the music.
